Texts.Chs: 我应该说过这个设备需要电力才能运行，你需要交流发电机或更好的供电设备。
Texts.Eng: I should mention that this station requires power to run, which you can get from an Alternator or better power source.

Texts.Chs: 现在，是时候大幅提升蜂蜜产量了。制造一台^orange;工业离心机^reset;^orange;。你要找到一些^orange;沙子^reset;来生产需要用到的玻璃，去沙漠试试。
Texts.Eng: Now it's time to maximize your output. Build an ^orange;Industrial Centrifuge^reset;. You'll need to find some ^orange;Sand^reset; to make the glass you need. Try a desert!
